message: I'll give you a decent amount to start, but don't get too comfortable!
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'm willing to give you a slight advantage, but I'm not giving away everything. Let's be reasonable.
You're not getting away from me that easily! I'll give you a small consolation prize.
I'm not giving up, but I'm starting to feel the pressure.  This is my final offer before we both lose out.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm giving you a tiny lifeline, but don't think you're getting a second chance!
I'm desperate now, Alice. This is my last stand. Take it or we both lose.
